title: Far out kids animation
creator_credit: Paul Williams, Peter Nicholson, Steve French and Anthony Lucas
brief_description: The AFI put together this compilation of Australian animated films suitable for children under nine. It includes: “There’s Dragons” - a funny film about a silly dragon, “That’s Progress” - a young boy doing a school project on historic buildings is constantly thwarted by Mr Progress, who keeps demolishing the buildings to put up car parks, “The Lighthouse Made Three” a whimsical love story based on a popular song. “Thumpalong” about a king who hates music, and “DuDu and the Line”, a celebration of the wild and free flowing transformations available to the animator.
creator_credit_for_label: Paul Williams, Peter Nicholson, Steve French and Anthony Lucas
